entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
